job.title: Data Analyst
job.description: <p>This Data Analyst will be responsible for collecting, analyzing, and offers transparency into customer behavior and business performance.</p><p><br></p><p>Essential duties and responsibilities include but not limited to:</p><p>• Strong analytic skills and ability to develop dashboard and reports using Tableau to enable customers to analyze data and make business decisions.</p><p>• Ability to work iteratively and converts business requirements quick prototypes with different Visualization options</p><p>• Ability to understand core business questions needing answered</p><p>• Ability to write custom calculations (or queries) within the data visualization tool Tableau.</p><p>• Solid understanding of Tableau presentation and data layer and implementation of Security with Tableau</p><p>• Experience in rolling out Tableau as Self-service solution for large number of users</p><p>• Hands on experience in Tableau reporting, Tableau server management</p><p>• Experience in building Integration of Tableau with like MS SQL</p><p>• Ability to consult business users to build Tableau dashboards</p><ul><li>• This role will require collaboration with end users, project stakeholders, and support partners to identify needs, goals, metric measurements, and business models which will result in easy-to-understand interfaces and enable end users to quickly identify key themes within the data</li></ul>
